title: The servers
body:
Are becoming absolute trash. 

-Ongoing problems that have never been fixed for over a year now.

Previous rank game just had both teams fully dc at the same time everyone just dropped out for 5 mins. How many people have to raise their voice before this issue is taken seriously?

And for the record I gave up and started playing HOTS which worked perfectly fine on my 40 ping (I'm so suprised)

replies.body:
> Ongoing problems that have never been fixed for over a year now.

I guess I must be playing on a different server to you.

I've once played a game where every minute or so our whole team would fully disconnect for about 15seconds then end up dead/in base when we reconnected. Only happened to our team but not the enemy for some reason or another. It was not just me but our whole team..
That sounds more like a DDoS than server problems.

Well they did take advantage of us doing by killing and pushing turrets, not much we could do..
Who would want to DDoS a normal game though?
note: was a few months ago

> Who would want to DDoS a normal game though?

People who know they're crap but still want to win every match. It happens.

Also the case where people just cannot move or recall but can type in the chat. Only thing they can do is disconnect and then reconnect. I am spectating games and frequently see this happening. And their internet is fine (e.g. browser is working).

[Here is an example](http://oi61.tinypic.com/9sta1z.jpg)

Been happening since 5.4 patch imo.
Mm recently me and my friends have randomly started getting insane spikes and we're all with different ISPs. Only started happening in the past 2 months or so though.
No but their servers actually work.

Definitely happened earlier today. Was playing with my friend who is in NZ, we both dc'd, as did everyone else on both teams. Another friend who was playing in a different game at the same time had an identical issue. Rito pls...
